main event: A sighting of a fast, blue-white object over Newport Beach, California on 17 Aug 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 2 seconds., The object was described as moving as fast as a jet without making any sound or leaving a trail., The sighting involved one object that flew straight before fading away., The report suggests the object could possibly be a meteor., The witness was a 46-year-old female housewife.
